name: Horde (swagtorious)
description:
The Apocalypse has come, but mankind is still fighting for its survival. Scientists around the world have been working on a cure for the "Blyth" a plague that consumes the host and reduces them to the basic human need, to feed. 

The WHO has assembled a "Recovery" team to cover the globe and secure the research from 7 scientists in an effort to restore world order. However, darker minds have also established the same mission, but as a means to control the world. It is your teams' mission to find and secure the 7 scientists, or their research and return them safely. 

Your goal in this first mission is to reach to Hospital roof and secure the scientific research.
